TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DSACryptoServiceProvider extends System.Security.Cryptography.DSA implements class System.Security.Cryptography.ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm
Public NotInheritable Class DSACryptoServiceProvider Inherits DSA Implements ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm
public ref class DSACryptoServiceProvider sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::DSA, System::Security::Cryptography::ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 定義包裝函式物件，以存取 演算法的密碼編譯服務供應者 (CSP) 實作。

span.span: Defines a wrapper object to access the cryptographic service provider (CSP) implementation of the algorithm.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別來建立數位簽章，並保護資料的完整性。You can use the class to create digital signatures and protect the integrity of your data. 若要使用公開金鑰系統以數位方式簽署訊息，寄件者先套用雜湊函式來建立訊息摘要。To use a public-key system to digitally sign a message, the sender first applies a hash function to the message to create a message digest. 寄件者接著會使用寄件者的私密金鑰來建立個人簽章寄件者的加密訊息摘要。The sender then encrypts the message digest with the sender's private key to create the sender's personal signature. 在收到訊息和簽章，接收者會使用寄件者的公開金鑰來復原訊息摘要簽章，並使用雜湊訊息寄件者使用的相同雜湊演算法。Upon receiving the message and signature, the receiver decrypts the signature using the sender's public key to recover the message digest and hashes the message using the same hash algorithm that the sender used. 如果接收者計算完全相符的訊息摘要寄件者收到的訊息摘要，接收者可以確定訊息在傳輸過程中沒有遭到竄改。If the message digest that the receiver computes exactly matches the message digest received from the sender, the receiver can be sure that the message was not altered while in transit. 請注意，可以驗證簽章的任何人，因為寄件者的公開金鑰是通用資訊。Note that a signature can be verified by anyone, because the sender's public key is common knowledge. > [!NOTE] > 使用較新的非對稱演算法。Newer asymmetric algorithms are available. 請考慮使用類別而不是類別。Consider using the class instead of the class. 使用只為了與舊版的應用程式和資料的相容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. 這個演算法在 64 位元為增量來支援 1024 位元到 512 位元的金鑰長度。This algorithm supports key lengths from 512 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 64 bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來擷取密碼編譯金鑰組的其他資訊。Use the property to retrieve additional information about a cryptographic key pair. 傳回物件描述金鑰是否可匯出，並指定金鑰容器名稱、 資訊提供者，以及其他資訊。The returned object describes whether the key is exportable, and specifies the key container name, information about the provider, and other information. 在產生的隨機金鑰的地方的情況下，直到您呼叫的方法，會使用金鑰不會建立的金鑰容器。In cases where a random key is generated, a key container will not be created until you call a method that uses the key. 某些屬性所傳回物件屬性將會擲回如果尚未建立的金鑰容器。Some properties of the object returned by the property will throw a if a key container has not been created. 若要確定已建立的金鑰容器，呼叫的方法如， ， ， ，依此類推，之前先呼叫屬性。To make sure that a key container has been created, call a method such as , , , , and so on, before you call the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性設定為 true，就相當於傳遞旗標設為物件。Setting this property to true is equivalent to passing the flag to a object. 屬性會套用至目前的應用程式定義域中的所有程式碼時物件只適用於明確地參考它的類別。The property applies to all code in the current application domain, while the object applies only to classes that explicitly reference it. 這些設定會模擬或未載入其使用者設定檔的帳戶下執行時很有用。These settings are useful when impersonating or running under an account whose user profile is not loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會驗證所產生的數位簽章。This method verifies the digital signature produced by . 如果`str`參數是`null`，會使用預設雜湊演算法 (SHA1)。If the `str` parameter is `null`, the default hash algorithm (SHA1) is used. 有效的雜湊演算法是。The valid hash algorithms is .

The parameter is .

span.span: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
-or-
The signature cannot be verified.
